oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cycloaddition of cyclohexa-2,4-dienones with electron deficient 2 pi partners: a novel and stereoselective route to functionalised bicyclo[2.2.2]octenones
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, V
PAL, S
MOBIN, SM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: masked o-benzoquinones
diels-alder reactions
ring-systems
rearrangement
derivatives
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A novel route to functionalised bicyclo[2.2.2]octenones via pi(4s) + pi(2s) cycloaddition of cyclohexa-2,4-dienones with electron deficient 2 partners, and crystal structure of 1,7-dimethyl-5-hydroxy-5-chloromethyl-2-carboethoxy bicyclo[ 2.2.2] oct-7-ene-6-one, is reported.
